Effect (JP): クリティカル率が12%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases Critical Hit Rate by 12%.
Effect (Global): Increases Critical Hit Rate by 12%.

Effect (JP): クリティカル率が15%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases Critical Hit Rate by 15%.
Effect (Global): Increases Critical Hit Rate by 15%.

Effect (JP): PPの自然回復速度が17%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases Natural PP Recovery by 17%.
Effect (Global): Increases Natural PP recovery by 17%.

Effect (JP): PPが40%以上の時、与ダメージが3%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 3% while PP is at 40% or above.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 3% while PP is at or above 40%.

Effect (JP): 与ダメージが3%上昇し、抜刀時のみ被ダメージが6%増える。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 3% but take 6% more damage when weapon is drawn.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 3% but take 6% more damage while your weapon is drawn.

Effect (JP): 攻撃時のPP回復量が17%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases Active PP Recovery by 17%.
Effect (Global): Increases active PP recovery by 17%.

Effect (JP): 攻撃時のPP回復量が20%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases Active PP Recovery by 20%.
Effect (Global): Increases active PP recovery by 20%.

Effect (JP): 一定時間ごとにHPを60%回復する。
Effect (English): Recovers 60% of your maximum HP every 40 seconds.
Effect (Global): Restores 60% of your maximum HP every 40 seconds.

Effect (JP): 一定時間ごとにHPを75%回復する。
Effect (English): Recovers 75% of your maximum HP every 40 seconds.
Effect (Global): Restores 75% of your maximum HP every 40 seconds.

Effect (JP): 4秒ごとにPPを10回復する。
Effect (English): Restores 10 PP every 4 seconds.
Effect (Global): Restores 10 PP every 4 seconds.

Effect (JP): 被ダメージを7%軽減。
Effect (English): Reduces damage taken by 7%.
Effect (Global): Reduces damage taken by 7%.

Effect (JP): 被ダメージを10%軽減。
Effect (English): Reduces damage taken by 10%.
Effect (Global): Reduces damage taken by 10%.

Effect (JP): クリティカル時の与ダメージが3%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Critical Hit damage by 3%.
Effect (Global): Increases Critical Hit damage by 3%.

Effect (JP): クリティカル時の与ダメージが4%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Critical Hit damage by 4%.
Effect (Global): Increases Critical Hit damage by 4%.

Effect (JP): 強敵への与ダメージが3%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases damage dealt to bosses by 3%.
Effect (Global): Increases damage dealt to bosses by 3%.

Effect (JP): 破壊可能な部位を攻撃した際、攻撃時PP回復量が35%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Active PP recovery by 35% when attacking breakable parts.
Effect (Global): Increases Active PP recovery by 35% when attacking breakable parts.

Effect (JP): 納刀・抜刀を行う事でPP回復速度が変化。
Effect (English): Natural PP regeneration rate increased by 100% while weapon is sheathed. Natural PP regeneration rate reduced by 100% while weapon is unsheathed.
Effect (Global): Natural PP regeneration rate increased by 100% while weapon is sheathed. Natural PP regeneration rate reduced by 100% while weapon is unsheathed.

Effect (JP): 破壊可能な部位を攻撃した際、威力が3%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases damage against breakable parts by 3%.
Effect (Global): Increases damage against breakable parts by 3%.

Effect (JP): 与ダメージが2%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 2%.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 2%.

Effect (JP): PP消費量を10%軽減。
Effect (English): Reduces PP consumption by 10%.
Effect (Global): Reduces PP consumption by 10%.

Effect (JP): PP消費量を13%軽減。
Effect (English): Reduces PP consumption by 13%.
Effect (Global): Reduces PP consumption by 13%.

Effect (JP): PP消費量を15%軽減。
Effect (English): Reduces PP consumption by 15%.
Effect (Global): Reduces PP consumption by 15%.

Effect (JP): 一定の範囲内でエネミーが死亡した時、PPが回復する。
Effect (English): Recovers 3 PP when an enemy near you is defeated.
Effect (Global): Recovers 3 PP when a nearby enemy is defeated.

Effect (JP): 一定確率で与ダメージの1%をHPとして吸収。(上限300)
Effect (English): Grants a 10% chance to restore HP equal to 1% of damage dealt. Maximum amount of HP restored is 300.
Effect (Global): Grants a 10% chance to restore HP equal to 1% of damage dealt. Maximum amount of HP restored is 300.

Effect (JP): ダメージを受けた際にPPを15%回復する。
Effect (English): Recovers 15% of your max PP when you take damage.
Effect (Global): Recovers 15% of your max PP when you take damage.

Effect (JP): 別のPAやテクニックをジャストアタックすると与ダメージが3%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 3% when consecutively chaining different PAs or Techniques with Just Attacks.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 3% when consecutively chaining different PAs or Techniques with Perfect Attacks.

Effect (JP): 花ノ赤閃・海ノ青閃・雪ノ白閃が発動中、与ダメージが3%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 3% while S1:Red Petal Flash, S1:Blue Ocean Flash, or S1:White Snow Flash are active.
Effect (Global): While Petalgleam, Seagleam, or Snowgleam are active, damage is increased by 3%.

Effect (JP): 花ノ赤閃・海ノ青閃・雪ノ白閃が発動中、クリティカル率20%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Critical Hit Rate by 20% while S1:Red Petal Flash, S1:Blue Ocean Flash, or S1:White Snow Flash are active.
Effect (Global): While Petalgleam, Seagleam, or Snowgleam are active, damage is increased by 3%.

Effect (JP): 花ノ赤閃・海ノ青閃・雪ノ白閃が発動中、PP消費量を12%軽減。
Effect (English): Decreases PP consumption by 12% while S1:Red Petal Flash, S1:Blue Ocean Flash, or S1:White Snow Flash are active.
Effect (Global): While Petalgleam, Seagleam, or Snowgleam are active, PP consumption is reduced by 12%.

Effect (JP): 花ノ赤閃・海ノ青閃・雪ノ白閃が発動中、PP消費量を14%軽減。
Effect (English): Decreases PP consumption by 14% while S1:Red Petal Flash, S1:Blue Ocean Flash, or S1:White Snow Flash are active.
Effect (Global): While Petalgleam, Seagleam, or Snowgleam are active, PP consumption is reduced by 14%.

Effect (JP): 花ノ赤閃・海ノ青閃・雪ノ白閃が発動中、毎秒HPが2%回復。
Effect (English): Recovers 2% of max HP every second while S1:Red Petal Flash, S1:Blue Ocean Flash, or S1:White Snow Flash are active.
Effect (Global): While Petalgleam, Seagleam, or Snowgleam are active, recover 2% of max HP every second.

Effect (JP): 月ノ黄閃・葉ノ緑閃・影ノ黒閃が発動中、被ダメージを12%軽減。
Effect (English): Decreases damage taken by 12% while S1:Yellow Moon Flash, S1:Green Leaf Flash, or S1:Black Shadow Flash are active.
Effect (Global): While Moongleam, Leafgleam, or Shadowgleam are active, natural PP recovery is increased by 25%.

Effect (JP): 月ノ黄閃・葉ノ緑閃・影ノ黒閃が発動中、PP自然回復量25%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Natural PP Recovery by 25% while S1:Yellow Moon Flash, S1:Green Leaf Flash, or S1:Black Shadow Flash are active.
Effect (Global): While Moongleam, Leafgleam, or Shadowgleam are active, natural PP recovery is increased by 25%.

Effect (JP): 月ノ黄閃・葉ノ緑閃・影ノ黒閃が発動中、毎秒威力が上昇。最大で5%。
Effect (English): Increases damage over time while S1:Yellow Moon Flash, S1:Green Leaf Flash, or S1:Black Shadow Flash are active. Maxes out at 5% after 37.5 seconds.
Effect (Global): While Moongleam, Leafgleam, or Shadowgleam are active, damage increases every second. Maxes out at 5% after 37.5 seconds.

Effect (JP): 月ノ黄閃・葉ノ緑閃・影ノ黒閃が発動中、毎秒威力が上昇。最大で7%。
Effect (English): Increases damage over time while S1:Yellow Moon Flash, S1:Green Leaf Flash, or S1:Black Shadow Flash are active. Maxes out at 7% after 37.5 seconds.
Effect (Global): While Moongleam, Leafgleam, or Shadowgleam are active, damage increases every second. Maxes out at 7% after 37.5 seconds.

Effect (JP): 月ノ黄閃・葉ノ緑閃・影ノ黒閃が発動中、攻撃時PP回復量が25%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Active PP Recovery by 25% while S1:Yellow Moon Flash, S1:Green Leaf Flash, or S1:Black Shadow Flash are active.
Effect (Global): While Moongleam, Leafgleam, or Shadowgleam are active, active PP recovery is increased by 25%.

Effect (JP): 月ノ黄閃・葉ノ緑閃・影ノ黒閃が発動中、攻撃時PP回復量が28%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Active PP Recovery by 28% while S1:Yellow Moon Flash, S1:Green Leaf Flash, or S1:Black Shadow Flash are active.
Effect (Global): While Moongleam, Leafgleam, or Shadowgleam are active, active PP recovery is increased by 28%.

Effect (JP): 花・海・葉・月・雪・影のいずれかが発動中与ダメージが5%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 5% while S1:Red Petal Flash, S1:Blue Ocean Flash, S1:White Snow Flash, S1:Yellow Moon Flash, S1:Green Leaf Flash, or S1:Black Shadow Flash are active.
Effect (Global): While Petalgleam, Seagleam, Snowgleam, Moongleam, Leafgleam, or Shadowgleam are active, damage is increased by 5%.

Effect (JP): 花・海・葉・月・雪・影のいずれかが発動中毎秒HPが3%回復。
Effect (English): Recovers 3% max HP every second while S1:Red Petal Flash, S1:Blue Ocean Flash, S1:White Snow Flash, S1:Yellow Moon Flash, S1:Green Leaf Flash, or S1:Black Shadow Flash are active.
Effect (Global): While Petalgleam, Seagleam, Snowgleam, Moongleam, Leafgleam, or Shadowgleam are active, recover 3% max HP every second.

Effect (JP): 炎耐性、バーン耐性が上昇。敵の弱点属性が炎属性の時、威力上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Fire Resistance and Burn Resistance by 30%. Increases damage by 3% against enemies weak to Fire.
Effect (Global): Increases Fire Resistance and Burn resistance by 30%. Increases damage by 3% against enemies weak to fire.

Effect (JP): 氷耐性、フリーズ耐性が上昇。敵の弱点属性が氷属性の時、威力上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Ice Resistance and Freeze Resistance by 30%. Increases damage by 3% against enemies weak to Ice.
Effect (Global): Increases Ice Resistance and Freeze Resistance by 30%. Increases damage by 3% against enemies weak to Ice.

Effect (JP): 雷耐性、ショック耐性が上昇。敵の弱点属性が雷属性の時、威力上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Lightning Resistance and Shock Resistance by 30%. Increases damage by 3% against enemies weak to Lightning.
Effect (Global): Increases Lightning Resistance and Shock Resistance by 30%. Increases damage by 3% against enemies weak to Lightning.

Effect (JP): 風耐性、ミラージュ耐性が上昇。敵の弱点属性が風属性の時、威力上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Wind Resistance and Mirage Resistance by 30%. Increases damage by 3% against enemies weak to Wind.
Effect (Global): Increases Wind Resistance and Blind Resistance by 30%. Increases damage by 3% against enemies weak to Wind.

Effect (JP): 光耐性、パニック耐性が上昇。敵の弱点属性が光属性の時、威力上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Light Resistance and Panic Resistance by 30%. Increases damage by 3% against enemies weak to Light.
Effect (Global): Increases Light Resistance and Panic Resistance by 30%. Increases damage by 3% against enemies weak to Light.

Effect (JP): 闇耐性、ポイズン耐性が上昇。敵の弱点属性が闇属性の時、威力上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Dark Resistance and Poison Resistance by 30%. Increases damage by 3% against enemies weak to Dark.
Effect (Global): Increases Dark Resistance and Poison Resistance by 30%. Increases damage by 3% against enemies weak to Dark.

Effect (JP): 別のPAやテクニックをジャストアタックするとPP消費量を12%軽減。
Effect (English): Reduces PP consumption by 12% when consecutively chaining different PAs or Techniques with Just Attacks.
Effect (Global): Reduces PP consumption by 12% when consecutively chaining different PAs or Techniques with Perfect Attacks.

Effect (JP): 別のPAやテクニックをジャストアタックするとPP消費量を20%軽減。
Effect (English): Reduces PP consumption by 20% when consecutively chaining different PAs or Techniques with Just Attacks.
Effect (Global): Reduces PP consumption by 20% when consecutively chaining different PAs or Techniques with Perfect Attacks.

Effect (JP): メイト系アイテム使用時さらにPPが回復する。効果量は種類で変わる。
Effect (English):
Restores varying amounts of PP upon consuming a -mate item (Works with Automate).
Monomate: 10 PP
Dimate: 30 PP
Trimate: 60 PP
Effect (Global):
Restores varying amounts of PP upon consuming a -mate item (Works with Automate).
Monomate: 10 PP
Dimate: 30 PP
Trimate: 60 PP

Effect (JP): メイト系アイテム使用時さらにPPが回復する。効果量は種類で変わる。
Effect (English):
Restores varying amounts of PP upon consuming a -mate item (Works with Automate).
Monomate: 30 PP
Dimate: 50 PP
Trimate: 80 PP
Effect (Global):
Restores varying amounts of PP upon consuming a -mate item (Works with Automate).
Monomate: 30 PP
Dimate: 50 PP
Trimate: 80 PP

Effect (JP): フォトンブラストゲージに応じて攻撃時PP回復量が上昇する。
Effect (English):
Increases Natural PP recovery based on the Photon Blast Gauge.
0~3 bars: 10%
4~7 bars: 20%
Full charge: 23%
Effect (Global):
Increases Natural PP recovery based on the Photon Blast Gauge.
0~3 bars: 11%
4~7 bars: 22%
Full charge: 25%

Effect (JP): フォトンブラストゲージに応じてPP自然回復量が上昇する。
Effect (English):
Increases Active PP recovery based on the Photon Blast Gauge.
0~3 bars: 11%
4~7 bars: 22%
Full charge: 25%
Effect (Global):
Increases Active PP recovery based on the Photon Blast Gauge.
0~3 bars: 11%
4~7 bars: 22%
Full charge: 25%

Effect (JP): フォトンブラストゲージに応じて被ダメージ量が減少する。
Effect (English):
Reduces damage taken based on the Photon Blast Gauge.
0~3 bars: 4%
4~7 bars: 7%
Full charge: 9%
Effect (Global):
Reduces damage taken based on the Photon Blast Gauge.
0~3 bars: 4%
4~7 bars: 7%
Full charge: 9%

Effect (JP): HP25%以下でジャストガード成功時HP50%PP30%回復。
Effect (English): Successfully performing a Just Guard while below 25% HP recovers 50% max HP and 30% max PP.
Effect (Global): Successfully performing a Perfect Guard while below 25% HP recovers 50% max HP and 30% max PP.

Effect (JP):
フォトンアーツまたはテクニック命中後30秒間、PPの消費量を軽減。
また、まれに大きく軽減することがある。効果発動後にリキャストが発生。
Effect (English):
Reduces PP consumption by 5% for 30 seconds upon landing a PA or Technique.
Has a 33% chance to reduce PP consumption by 30% instead.
35 second cooldown upon activation.
Effect (Global):
Reduces PP consumption by 5% for 30 seconds upon landing a PA or Technique.
Has a 33% chance to reduce PP consumption by 30% instead.
35 second cooldown upon activation.

Effect (JP): ダッシュ状態時PP自然回復量が100%上昇しHPが5秒ごとに回復。
Effect (English): Increases Natural PP recovery by 100% and restores 15% of your max HP every 5 seconds while running.
Effect (Global): Increases Natural PP recovery by 100% and restores 15% of your max HP for every 5 seconds you are running.

Effect (JP):
空中時では、PP消費量が8％軽減。
地上時では自然PP回復量が20％かつ地上での攻撃時ではPP回復量が20％上昇。
Effect (English):
Reduces PP consumption by 8% while airborne.
Increases Natural PP and Active PP recovery by 20% while on the ground.
Effect (Global):
Reduces PP consumption by 8% while airborne.
Increases Natural PP and Active PP recovery by 20% while on the ground.

Effect (JP):
空中時では、PP消費量が15％軽減。
地上時では自然PP回復量が25％かつ地上での攻撃時ではPP回復量が35％上昇。
Effect (English): Reduces PP consumption by 15% while airborne. Increases Natural PP and Active PP recovery by 25% while on the ground.
Effect (Global): Reduces PP consumption by 15% while airborne. Increases Natural PP and Active PP recovery by 25% while on the ground.

Effect (JP): 一定間隔で自身にデバンドを発動する。
Effect (English): Automatically casts Deband on self every 14 seconds. Uses your currently learned level of Deband.
Effect (Global): Automatically casts Deband on self every 14 seconds. Uses your currently learned level of Deband.

Effect (JP): 別のPAやテクニックをジャストアタックするとクリティカル威力2%クリティカル率15%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Critical Hit Rate by 15% and Critical Hit Power by 2% when consecutively chaining different PAs or Techniques with Just Attacks.
Effect (Global): Increases Critical Hit Rate by 15% and Critical Hit Power by 2% when consecutively chaining different PAs or Techniques with Perfect Attacks.

Effect (English): Increases power by 5% and reduce damage taken by 12% in the Extreme Quest [Solo Training: Phanatical Phantoms].

Effect (JP): 威力とクリティカル率が上昇。PP効率が向上。被ダメージで消失。一定時間で効果が復活。
Effect (English):
Increases damage by 4% and Critical Hit Rate by 5%.
Enhances PP efficiency as follows:
PP recovery +10%
Active PP recovery +15%
PP consumption -5%.
Effects will be lost when damage is taken (180s cooldown).
Effect (Global):
Increases damage by 4% and Critical Hit Rate by 5%.
Enhances PP efficiency as follows:
PP recovery +10%
Active PP recovery +15%
PP consumption -5%.
Effects will be lost when damage is taken (180s cooldown).
